Shop now Our Most Popular AN Hose and Fittings Bundles / Kits - Amazing Value AN Hose and Fittings Bundles / Kits - Amazing Value LS Engine AN fuel system swap kits LS Engine AN fuel system swap kits AN hose install tools AN hose install tools AN PTFE Hose end fittings AN PTFE Hose end fittings AN Fitting Adapters AN Fitting Adapters Perfect for LS Swaps and EFI Conversions Find the Right AN Plumbing Parts with Our Expert Fuel System How-To Guides Hot Rod AN LLC offers detailed, step-by-step fuel system how-to guides designed to help you select the best parts for your build. Whether you're working on an LS engine swap , EFI fuel system conversion , transmission cooler installation , or setting up your fuel pump, fuel filter, or fuel pressure regulator , our guides have you covered. Learn how to choose the correct AN PTFE hose and AN fittings for your specific application, and ensure your AN plumbing system is leak-free, reliable, and performance-ready. Read More on AN Hose 101 How Hot Rod AN LLC started The Origin of Hot Rod AN LLC – Built from Experience, Driven by Passion Our journey began with a rough but promising Chevy C10 project truck . Like many builds, it demanded more time and money than expected—but it also sparked an idea. During the EFI conversion , we realized how overpriced and limited the options were for high-quality AN PTFE braided hose and AN fittings for performance fuel systems. That frustration led to the original launch of Hot Rod Fuel Hose. We sourced manufacturers, ordered samples, and rigorously tested products to ensure reliability, safety, and compatibility with modern automotive fluids. The goal? Offer high-performance AN hose and fittings at a price that makes sense for everyday builders, racers, and enthusiasts. After Hot Rod Fuel Hose ceased operations, the mission didn't end—it evolved. Hot Rod AN LLC was born to carry the torch and deliver even better service, product selection, and support for the DIY and professional automotive community across the USA and Canada. We’re proud to serve customers who are building EFI systems, fuel delivery setups, and complete AN plumbing solutions with confidence. Whether you're working on a classic truck, performance car, or race vehicle, Hot Rod AN LLC is your trusted source for PTFE braided hose, AN fittings, fuel system kits, and more . Read more about Hot Rod AN LLC Fuel Your Build with the Best – AN PTFE Hose, LS Swap Kits & EFI Fuel System Solutions At Hot Rod AN LLC , we specialize in helping builders of all skill levels create reliable, clean, and professional-grade fuel systems using high-quality AN PTFE hose, fittings, and fuel system kits . Whether you're working on an LS swap , upgrading from carbureted to EFI, or building a custom vehicle from scratch, our product lineup is built around one goal—getting you the right parts the first time. We’ve taken the guesswork out of performance plumbing. From complete LS engine fuel system kits to PTFE AN hose fittings and AN hose bundles , every item we carry is tried, tested, and proven to hold up under pressure—even in high-performance and ethanol-blended fuel environments. What sets us apart? It’s more than just quality parts. We design our kits and bundles with the builder in mind. That means fittings that seal, hoses that don’t stink up your garage, and complete solutions that save you time and frustration. We know what works in the real world because we build these systems ourselves, not just stock them on a shelf. Built for LS Swaps, EFI Conversions & Modern Fuel Systems Doing an LS swap on your squarebody C10, K10, or Blazer? Upgrading your classic to EFI? We offer purpose-built solutions to make those installs clean, reliable, and long-lasting. Our fuel system swap kits are built around PTFE hose to eliminate vapor smell and fuel permeation issues common with traditional rubber-based AN hoses. We also carry components like inline and in-tank fuel pumps , high-performance fuel filters , and EFI sending units so you can complete your entire fuel system in one order. No more piecing it together from five different stores. Everything here is curated to work together—and work well. Why PTFE Hose? PTFE-lined AN hose is the future of fuel system plumbing. It resists modern fuels like ethanol and E85, doesn’t break down over time, and virtually eliminates fuel vapor smell. If you’re tired of cracking rubber hoses or the gas odor in your garage, upgrading to PTFE is a must . Our hose kits include everything you need to plumb your project safely and cleanly, including your choice of color, length, and fitting angles. The Hot Rod AN Difference You don’t have to be a fabricator or shop owner to build a clean fuel system. We cater to both weekend wrenchers and professional installers with easy-to-use products, detailed install guides, and custom system planning . Need help figuring out what fittings or hoses you need? Reach out —we’ll guide you through it. Whether you're working on an LS engine swap , EFI fuel system conversion , transmission cooler installation , or setting up your fuel pump, fuel filter, or fuel pressure regulator , our guides have you covered. Learn how to choose the correct AN PTFE hose and AN fittings for your specific application, and ensure your AN plumbing system is leak-free, reliable, and performance-ready. Read More on AN Hose 101 How Hot Rod AN LLC started The Origin of Hot Rod AN LLC – Built from Experience, Driven by Passion Our journey began with a rough but promising Chevy C10 project truck . Like many builds, it demanded more time and money than expected—but it also sparked an idea. During the EFI conversion , we realized how overpriced and limited the options were for high-quality AN PTFE braided hose and AN fittings for performance fuel systems. That frustration led to the original launch of Hot Rod Fuel Hose. We sourced manufacturers, ordered samples, and rigorously tested products to ensure reliability, safety, and compatibility with modern automotive fluids. The goal? Offer high-performance AN hose and fittings at a price that makes sense for everyday builders, racers, and enthusiasts. After Hot Rod Fuel Hose ceased operations, the mission didn't end—it evolved. Hot Rod AN LLC was born to carry the torch and deliver even better service, product selection, and support for the DIY and professional automotive community across the USA and Canada. We’re proud to serve customers who are building EFI systems, fuel delivery setups, and complete AN plumbing solutions with confidence. Whether you're working on a classic truck, performance car, or race vehicle, Hot Rod AN LLC is your trusted source for PTFE braided hose, AN fittings, fuel system kits, and more . Read more about Hot Rod AN LLC Fuel Your Build with the Best – AN PTFE Hose, LS Swap Kits & EFI Fuel System Solutions At Hot Rod AN LLC , we specialize in helping builders of all skill levels create reliable, clean, and professional-grade fuel systems using high-quality AN PTFE hose, fittings, and fuel system kits . Whether you're working on an LS swap , upgrading from carbureted to EFI, or building a custom vehicle from scratch, our product lineup is built around one goal—getting you the right parts the first time. We’ve taken the guesswork out of performance plumbing. From complete LS engine fuel system kits to PTFE AN hose fittings and AN hose bundles , every item we carry is tried, tested, and proven to hold up under pressure—even in high-performance and ethanol-blended fuel environments. What sets us apart? It’s more than just quality parts. We design our kits and bundles with the builder in mind. That means fittings that seal, hoses that don’t stink up your garage, and complete solutions that save you time and frustration. We know what works in the real world because we build these systems ourselves, not just stock them on a shelf. Built for LS Swaps, EFI Conversions & Modern Fuel Systems Doing an LS swap on your squarebody C10, K10, or Blazer? Upgrading your classic to EFI? We offer purpose-built solutions to make those installs clean, reliable, and long-lasting. Our fuel system swap kits are built around PTFE hose to eliminate vapor smell and fuel permeation issues common with traditional rubber-based AN hoses. We also carry components like inline and in-tank fuel pumps , high-performance fuel filters , and EFI sending units so you can complete your entire fuel system in one order. No more piecing it together from five different stores. Everything here is curated to work together—and work well. Why PTFE Hose? PTFE-lined AN hose is the future of fuel system plumbing. It resists modern fuels like ethanol and E85, doesn’t break down over time, and virtually eliminates fuel vapor smell. If you’re tired of cracking rubber hoses or the gas odor in your garage, upgrading to PTFE is a must . Our hose kits include everything you need to plumb your project safely and cleanly, including your choice of color, length, and fitting angles. The Hot Rod AN Difference You don’t have to be a fabricator or shop owner to build a clean fuel system. We cater to both weekend wrenchers and professional installers with easy-to-use products, detailed install guides, and custom system planning . Need help figuring out what fittings or hoses you need? Reach out —we’ll guide you through it. Whether you're working on a complete LS engine swap , an EFI fuel system upgrade , or building a custom plumbing solution, these tools make the job cleaner, faster, and more professional. PTFE hose can be tough to assemble without the right tools. That's why we've put together this collection of purpose-built AN hose installation tools designed specifically for PTFE braided hose and PTFE AN hose end fittings . Why Use PTFE Hose Assembly Tools? ✅ Prevents damage to the PTFE liner and stainless or nylon braid ✅ Helps achieve proper alignment and a leak-free seal ✅ Reduces time and frustration during installation ✅ Delivers a clean, professional result with minimal effort Recommended For 🔧 LS Engine Swaps – Get tight, reliable connections on your fuel line install 🔧 EFI Conversions – Cleanly assemble high-pressure lines with confidence 🔧 Transmission, Oil & Fuel Plumbing – Perfect for any fluid transfer line using AN fittings Tool Options in This Collection 🔩 AN Hose End Assembly Jigs – Securely hold hose and fitting during install 🔩 Adjustable AN Wrenches – Protect your fitting finishes while tightening 🔩 Vice Jaws & Inserts – Clamp fittings without damage 🔩 PTFE Hose Cutting Tools – Cleanly cut stainless or nylon braided hose without fraying Need Help With Installation? Be sure to read our AN PTFE Hose & Fittings Installation Instructions for step-by-step guidance and tips on using these tools correctly.
